list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: reside or have one's place of business in (a building).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the apartment she occupies in Manhattan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Căn hộ mà cô chiếm giữ ở Manhattan

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fill or preoccupy (the mind or thoughts).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her mind was occupied with alarming questions
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tâm trí cô đã bị chiếm giữ với những câu hỏi đáng báo động

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take control of (a place, especially a country) by military conquest or settlement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the region was occupied by Britain during World War I
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khu vực này đã bị chiếm bởi Anh trong Thế chiến I
